name: XLarn
description: This is a heavily extended version of one of the most famous roguelike games of the 80â€™s named LARN. Your choice is to find a magic elixier for your daughters recovery. Therefore you have to explore a lot of unknown caves, filled with monsters, demons and traps. Good luck! You may need it!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0Ghz Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Storage: 10 MB available space

reviews.review_text: One of the most addictive games ever once you get the hang of it, great to see it back!
